page.title: Welcome!
page.heroBox: This is my space for presenting myself and displaying my skills as a developer, with both projects for studying and that i believe to be usefull, or just fun!

presentations.portfolio website: Thanks to my experience from the web development internship i realized how powerfull next.js and its related technologies are. So i devided to apply all of it in this website so it represents well my skills.
presentations.java crud: O CRUD é um componente fundamental para web e vital que desenvolvedores conheçam, fiz esse em java
presentations.kotlin crud: O CRUD é um componente fundamental para web e vital que desenvolvedores conheçam, fiz esse em kotlin
